Help make Artemis better.

Join our open, friendly community and help make Artemis the people's desktop environment! Whether you are a developer, translator, or designer, there's some way you can contribute to such an amazing project.


Want to chat a bit?

The Artemis community communicates through multiple open platforms. Connected with IRC, you won't miss a beat on what's coming next. Take your pick.



Telegram

Discord

IRC bridge pending


Riot

IRC

Join channel: #artemis

Is the Riot link unresponsive or not working for you? Click here to see other options for joining our Matrix room.



Sameroom keeps us connected

Sameroom helps you keep your communication apps connected into one place. Connect your IRC channels to Slack or your Telegram channels to Google Hangouts. Sameroom also supports unlimited tubes for open source projects like us, allowing us to get to what matters most. Sameroom helps us keep Telegram and IRC connected so anyone can chat regardless of the app of their choice!

Try Sameroom






Got some code?

Our code resides in the wonderful community home of GitHub. Make pull requests, file issues, and contribute to the source code of the Artemis project with a free, online service that works with Git!

Go to GitHub
